nodes.documentation: The ENS registry contract.
nodes.name: ENSRegistry

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructs a new ENS registrar.

nodes.name: setRecord
setSubnodeRecord
setOwner
setSubnodeOwner
setResolver
setTTL
setApprovalForAll
owner
resolver
ttl
recordExists
isApprovedForAll

nodes.documentation: The ENS registry contract.
nodes.name: ENSRegistry

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructs a new ENS registrar.

nodes.name: setRecord
setSubnodeRecord
setOwner
setSubnodeOwner
setResolver
setTTL
setApprovalForAll
owner
resolver
ttl
recordExists
isApprovedForAll

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Query if an address is an authorized operator for another address.

params.operator: The address that acts on behalf of the owner.
params.owner: The address that owns the records.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if `operator` is an approved operator for `owner`, false otherwise.

owner(bytes32).details: Returns the address that owns the specified node.

recordExists(bytes32).details: Returns whether a record has been imported to the registry.

resolver(bytes32).details: Returns the address of the resolver for the specified node.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of `msg.sender`'s ENS records. Emits the ApprovalForAll event.

params.approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval.
params.operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators.

setOwner(bytes32,address).details: Transfers ownership of a node to a new address. May only be called by the current owner of the node.

params.node: The node to transfer ownership of.
params.owner: The address of the new owner.

setRecord(bytes32,address,address,uint64.details: Sets the record for a node.

params.owner: The address of the new owner.

setResolver(bytes32,address).details: Sets the resolver address for the specified node.

setSubnodeOwner(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Transfers ownership of a subnode keccak256(node, label) to a new address. May only be called by the owner of the parent node.

params.label: The hash of the label specifying the subnode.
params.owner: The address of the new owner.

setSubnodeRecord(bytes32,bytes32,address.details: Sets the record for a subnode.

params.label: The hash of the label specifying the subnode.
params.owner: The address of the new owner.

setTTL(bytes32,uint64).details: Sets the TTL for the specified node.

ttl(bytes32).details: Returns the TTL of a node, and any records associated with it.
